author: Nick Caputo
description: Cognac, chartreuse, sloe gin and lemon juice served in a tall foaming fizz – its name inspired by the Morning Glory Fizz.
name: Early Evening Fizz
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass (no ice in glass)
POUR soda into drink slowly from a height in order to build a (Ramos Gin Fizz style) thick foamy head
